Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Montpellier (Antigone), Mercure Montpellier Centre Comédie is minutes from FNAC Montpellier and Polygone Shopping Center. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Le Triangle Shopping Center and Citadel of Montpellier.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Mercure Montpellier Centre Comédie. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-out, a 24-hour front desk, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at Noon Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Mercure Montpellier Centre Comédie. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare.
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs and hair dryers.

Located in Montpellier (Antigone), Mercure Montpellier Centre Comédie is minutes from FNAC Montpellier and Polygone Shopping Center. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Le Triangle Shopping Center and Citadel of Montpellier.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

FNAC Montpellier - 0 km / 0 mi
Polygone Shopping Center - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Le Triangle Shopping Center - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Citadel of Montpellier - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Pavillon Populaire - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Esplanade Charles de Gaulle - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Champ de Mars Garden - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Comedy Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Languedoc Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Opera House - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Fabre Museum - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Pharmacie de la Misericorde - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Hotel des Tresoriers de France - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Musee du Vieux Montpellier - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Notre Dame des Tables - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Montpellier (XPJ-Montpellier SNCF Train Station) - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Montpellier (MPL-Montpellier - Mediterranean) - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi

The preferred airport for Mercure Montpellier Centre Comédie is Montpellier (MPL-Montpellier - Mediterranean).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
